    • PlayerHuman

      public PlayerHuman(int randX, int randY, int velx, int vely, ColorValue color, String mode)
      Human player constructor with start position and velocity.
      Parameters:
      randX - x coordinate
      randY - y coordinate
      velx - starting velocity x
      vely - starting velocity y
      color - player color
      mode - game mode ("story", "survival", "twoPlayer")
